articles.title: Microbes cling on to International Space Station - here's why astronauts are trying to collect them - Sky News
articles.content:
Two astronauts are set to exit the International Space Station (ISS) later on a mission to gather living organisms growing on the facility.

articles.title: One of the rarest space events ever will soon be visible from Earth - indy100
